text: eṉiṉum (ippoḻutu) nam'miṭamiruntu cattiya(mārkka)m avarkaḷiṭam vanta pōtu, "mūsāvukkuk koṭukkappaṭṭatu pōṉṟu ivarukku ēṉ koṭukkappaṭavillai" eṉṟu kēṭkiṟārkaḷ; itaṟku muṉṉar, mūsāvukkuk koṭukkappaṭṭataiyum avar(kaḷiṉ mūtātaiyar)kaḷ nirākarikka villaiyā? Iṉṉum avarkaḷ kūṟukiṟārkaḷ; (tiruk kur'āṉum, tavrāttum)"oṉṟaiyoṉṟu uṟutippaṭuttum iraṇṭu cūṉiya(mantira)ṅkaḷē!" Eṉṟu iṉṉum avarkaḷ kūṟukiṟārkaḷ; "niccayamāka nāṅkaḷ (ivai) aṉaittaiyum nirākarikkiṟōm" eṉṟu
